    • Method Detail

      • enableBackButtonNavigation

        @Deprecated
public TreeDecorator enableBackButtonNavigation()
        Deprecated.
        use setBackButtonNavigationEnabled(boolean)

        Enables the defined tree to take advantage of the back button. This means when the back button will be pressed the tree navigates back.

        Since:
        0.10

      • setBackButtonNavigationEnabled

        public TreeDecorator setBackButtonNavigationEnabled​(boolean enabled)

        Enables or disables the defined tree to take advantage of the back button. This means when the back button will be pressed the tree navigates back.

        Since:
        1.3

      • setPreloadedItems

        public TreeDecorator setPreloadedItems​(int preloadedItems)

        Controls the number of preloaded items outside (above and below) visible area of a virtual Tree.

        Parameters:
        preloadedItems - the items to preload. Must be > 0.
        Since:
        1.2

      • setTemplate

        public TreeDecorator setTemplate​(org.eclipse.rap.rwt.template.Template template)

        Sets a Template on this tree.

        Parameters:
        template - the template to use. Must not be null.
        Since:
        1.2
        See Also:
        Template, Cell, RWT.ROW_TEMPLATE

      • setItemHeight

        public TreeDecorator setItemHeight​(int itemHeight)

        Set the item height of a TreeItem in pixels.

        Parameters:
        itemHeight - the item height in pixels. Must be >= 0.
        Since:
        1.2

      • setRefreshHandler

        public TreeDecorator setRefreshHandler​(RefreshHandler handler)

        Sets a RefreshHandler to a Tree. This instructs a client to add native refresh capabilities to the Tree.

        Parameters:
        handler - the RefreshHandler to add. Must not be null.
        Since:
        1.4
        See Also:
        RefreshHandler
